thumb.title: Trump tariffs are a declaration of economic war with the Chinese Communist Party 4-9-2025
thumb.description: NOTE https://note.com/minami_yoshiro/Social Capital Research Institute https://scm.hopegroup.jp/HOPE Group https://hopegroup.jp/HOPE BOOKS https://hopebooks.hopegroup.jp/TAIYODO Publishing https://taiyoudo.hopegroup.jp/ebooks/Management books related to Yoshiro Minami ＡＣＴ３ https://hopegroup.jp/cf2021/introduction2/ https://hopegroup.jp/act3/ It is a non-profit research institute that researches and develops new policies in the political and economic fields. We advocate a new social system based on the mechanism of capitalism, which is different from socialism, and make various policy proposals based on that mechanism.Professor Shiro Minami, who is the research institute's proposal instructor and is famous as a unique Naniwa speaker.Now that you can post the manuscript of your article, we will introduce the article on Niconico Douga.
